### INSTALL ###
IF(NOT WIN32)
	RETURN()
ENDIF()

IF(NOT EXISTS C:/mingw/msys/bin/autoconf-2.68)
	DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
	DKDOWNLOAD(http://digitalknob.com/Download/Tools/autoconf-2.68-1-msys-1.0.17-bin.tar)
	DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/Tools/autoconf-2.68-1-msys-1.0.17-bin.tar C:/mingw)
ENDIF()
